'''Adeptus Bridges''' are ribbon-like bridges that are found in the abodes of [[Adepti]]. They can be manipulated at interaction points where the player may be given options to activate, deactivate, or rotate the Adeptus Bridge.

These bridges have been featured in [[Madame Ping]]'s [[Inside the Teapot|teapot]] and [[Theater Mechanicus]]. They are also found in the [[Floating Abode]] Realm of the [[Serenitea Pot]], though they cannot be manipulated there.

The [[Adeptus Language]] can be found on Adeptus Bridges.
